name: Invasion of the Boysnatchers Quiz | Harrison, Lisi | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who is Alicia's cousin that is visiting?
questions.explanation:
Nina.

	Nina is visiting from Spain.

questions.text: Who was supposed to move to Chicago?
questions.explanation:
Claire.

	Claire ended up sharing a room with Massie.

false.

	Massie doesn't like Nina because she stole her boyfriend.

questions.text: How did Massie, Claire, and Alicia find out that Nina stole everyone's stuff?
questions.correct: they found a bag with the stolen stuff in it
questions.explanation:
they found a bag with the stolen stuff in it.

	They found Alicia's bag on top of Josh's locker.

false.

	Nina took Cam from Claire.

no one.

	Nina took the boots from Celia, so even if someone won the bet, they couldn't keep them.

questions.text: Who did Kristen want to kiss at the dance?
questions.explanation:
Kemp.

	Dylan wanted to kiss Chris at the dance.  Claire wanted to kiss Cam at the dance.  Massie wanted to kiss Derrington at the dance.

questions.text: Dylan kissed Chris at the dance.
questions.explanation:
false.

	Dylan wanted to kiss Chris, but she didn't do it.

Nina.

	Nina also took Massie's hair crimper.
